message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than what others have paid, but considering your perspective, I propose a special introductory price of $90. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored for you, ensuring you get a great deal while also allowing me to share a piece of value with someone who appreciates it as much as I do. Would you like to proceed with this offer?
